coreAttributes.name: half-hoodie
coreAttributes.description: A hoodie, cut to cover nothing but the shoulders, arms and back. Seems... counter-intuitive.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(guide)] [npc.her] [npc.arms] through the half-hoodie's sleeves as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] it down over [npc.her] head.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(guide)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.arms] through the half-hoodie's sleeves as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] it down over [npc2.her]
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.arms] through the half-hoodie's sleeves as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] it down over [npc2.her] head.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slip)] the half-hoodie over [npc.her] head and off [npc.her] [npc.arms].
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slip)] the half-hoodie over [npc2.namePos] head and off [npc2.her] [npc2.arms].
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] forcefully [npc.verb(yank)] the half-hoodie over [npc2.namePos] head and off [npc2.her] [npc2.arms].
